description: Nelson Muntz plugin hooks for in-session self-referential loops

notes.architecture: Nelson Muntz now uses in-session stop hooks (like Ralph Wiggum v2) instead of external bash loops. This enables proper looping in VS Code and other Claude Code environments.
notes.completion: Loop stops when: max_iterations reached, <promise>PHRASE</promise> detected, or <nelson-complete>ALL_FEATURES_COMPLETE</nelson-complete> output
